§ 30304. Contributory negligence In an action under this chapter, contributory negligence of the decedent is not a bar to recovery. The court shall consider the degree of negligence of the decedent and reduce the recovery accordingly. (Pub. L. 109–304, § 6(c), Oct. 6, 2006, 120 Stat. 1511.)
